item.name: confirm_delete
item.message: Do you really want to delete the marked emoticons?

item.name: create_error
item.message: While creating the emoticon an error has occured.

item.name: create_success
item.message: The emoticons has been created successfully.

item.name: delete_error
item.message: While deleting the marked emoticons an error has occured.

item.name: delete_success
item.message: The marked emoticons have been deleted successfully.

item.name: edit_error
item.message: While editing the emoticon an error has occured.

item.name: edit_success
item.message: The emoticon has been edited successfully.

item.name: mod_description
item.message: With this module it is possible to add emoticons for example to comments.

item.name: type_in_code
item.message: Please type in a code, which should be replaced with a picture

item.name: type_in_description
item.message: Please type in a short description
